nodes.text: Oshira was a planet located in the Mid Rim and the Trailing Sectors regions. It shared its name with Oshiran sapphires. Historian and author Eloc Throno included a map depicting the location of Oshira in his book Traveler's Guide to Batuu, which detailed the planet Batuu.
Oshira was mentioned in the 2020 reference book Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge: Traveler's Guide to Batuu, written by Cole Horton.
